Row.Text: All beings who are plunged into the ocean of existence, may I draw them out by virtue of this good work.
Jayavarman VII
While stands the Colosseum, Rome shall stand. When falls the Colosseum, Rome shall fall, and when Rome falls, with it shall fall the world.
The Venerable Bede
He doth bestride the narrow world, and we petty men walk under his huge legs, and peep about to find ourselves dishonorable graves.
William Shakespeare
From this day forward, your pronouncement shall be unchangeable, to raise or bring low - these shall be in your hand.
Enūma Eliš
In the midst of the snow, the light of Goreyo hovers; An icy temple bell resounds echoes of the old kingdom.
Hwang Jini
No man is foolish enough to desire war over peace: for in peace sons bury fathers, but in war fathers bury sons.
Croesus of Lydia
May the might of the Lord cause no enemy to resist me, no enemy to follow me.
Aksumite Inscription
I am the River, the River is me.
Whanganui saying
The canal-water gushes from above into the gardens; fragrance pervades the walkways, streams of water as numerous as the stars of heaven flow in the pleasure garden.
Ashurbanipal
Better it is for every man to avenge his friend than mourn him.
Beowulf
My light is great. I am the path and the foothold of the people, because my eyes are of metal, while my teeth glitter with jewels.
Popol Vuh
And here he lay, older than the hill he rested on.
Zitkala-Sa
If you desire ease, forsake learning. If you desire learning, forsake ease.
Nagarjuna
I count the grains of sand on the beach and measure the sea; I understand the speech of the dumb and hear the voiceless.
The Pythia
Sedentary life is civilization's goal. It marks the end of its life and heralds its corruption.
Ibn Khaldun
The warriors' blood flowed like water and gathered in pools.
Mexica Account of Toxcatl
Soldiers, from the summit of these pyramids, forty centuries of history look down upon you!
Napoleon Bonaparte
All religions should reside everywhere, for all of them desire self-control and purity of heart.
Ashoka
After the battle many new ghosts cry.
Du Fu
Heaven is lasting. Earth endures. Time has no limit. Regret goes on and on without end.
Bai Juyi
The place for the cure of the soul.
Inscription over the door at the library
